data.title: How Universities Are Building Human-Centered AI for Students
data.description: Universities are rapidly building AI policies, literacy programs, and human-centered centers to harness generative AI while safeguarding integrity, agency, and learning.
data.author: Bryan Penprase
data.keywords: AI in higher education,university AI policies,AI literacy programs,human-centered AI,generative AI on campus,AI ethics in education,AI learning centers,teaching with AI,academic integrity and AI
